Sentencas: It is significant to develop a green ammonia preparation method for decreasing carbon emission.
Titulo: One-step method to produce feedstock for green ammonia of H2:N2≥3:1 by solid oxide cell

Sentencas: This work demonstrates a zero-carbon method for preparing ammonia feedstock consisting of a ratio of H2:N2 >= 3:1 by direct electrolysis of air and steam as fuel gas through solid oxide electrolysis cell (SOEC).
Titulo: One-step method to produce feedstock for green ammonia of H2:N2≥3:1 by solid oxide cell

Sentencas: Through adjusting the working current and proportion of air/steam, the ratio of H2 and N2 can be achieved to more than 4:1, and the fuel is pure enough to be used for synthesizing ammonia.
Titulo: One-step method to produce feedstock for green ammonia of H2:N2≥3:1 by solid oxide cell

Sentencas: The production rate of ammonia feedstock reaches 1.79 x 10-6 mol/ (cm2 & sdot;s), and the energy conversion efficiency (ECE) reaches 69.30 %.
Titulo: One-step method to produce feedstock for green ammonia of H2:N2≥3:1 by solid oxide cell

Sentencas: A stable 100 h electrolysis operation is carried out to generate H2/N2 required for ammonia production.
Titulo: One-step method to produce feedstock for green ammonia of H2:N2≥3:1 by solid oxide cell

Sentencas: This work provides a new efficient method for the synthesis of green ammonia.
Titulo: One-step method to produce feedstock for green ammonia of H2:N2≥3:1 by solid oxide cell
